author: Jay S Brindle
comment: it always crashes as soon as I try open it on my moto 360 :/
title: Looks good on video but...

author: Laswhawn Wiley
comment: Will give 5 stars when I am able to add more than 2 numbers. A calculator should be able to add 44+645+33 I need this feature. I love the size of buttons.
title: Developer please add this function.

author: Alan Burgos
comment: Works great, and haven't had any issues with it. Being able to change the long press timer is awesome. Only wish that I could customize the don't colors, but that's just my own personal preferences. Great app as it is and very responsive devs 😃

reply.author: KastenTech
reply.content:
Hello Alan,

I have added a Long press length setting to the app, just swipe right to left to bring up the settings. Changing colors is something I plan on adding in a future update.

Thanks.

title: Does What It Says

author: Leroy Serrette III
comment: Nice and very solid works very well
title: Nice and solid app

author: Bernd Werres
comment: App had sync issue which was resolved by developer within minutes of purchase. Great solution for wear on LG G watch. Nice layout with large enough keys.
title: Working Good

author: Adam Doyle
comment: I thought the delete function was missing but you just swipe down to delete. Thanks for the quick reply KastenTech.

reply.author: KastenTech
reply.content:
Hello Adam,

The function already exists in the app, just swipe down to backspace which will delete the last inputted value or symbol.

Thanks.

title: Swipe down to delete

author: James Kemp
comment: Works just as advertised. Very pleased.
title: Perfect

author: Mark Ward
comment: There is a free on in the app store that works much better. You don't have to long press for the functions.

reply.author: KastenTech
reply.content:
Hello Mark,

Update to 1.1.0 and swipe right to left to open the settings, change the "Long press length" to "Very short(200ms)" or "Super Short(150ms)". Now the long press won't slow you down! I have designed this app to use a 3x3 layout so the buttons are much easier to press accurately than the other free ones out there.

Thanks.

title: Better Calculators Available
